snippet.title: Colin Moriarty talks Intergalatic, Naughty Dog, PS6, Trophies, GTA 6, Sacred Symbols & Last Stand
snippet.description:
Dan Allen and Colin Moriarty dive deep into Naughty Dog, GTA 6, The Last of Us Online, the PS6, chaos at PlayStation leadership, and the business of running the biggest PlayStation podcast, plus mandatory PSN trophy talk!

Follow Colin:
https://x.com/longislandviper
https://www.youtube.com/@LastStand-Media

Timestamps:
0:00 - Intro
1:10 - Colin's New Game Saint Slayer: Spear of Sacrilege
2:55 - Writing for Games and the Scared Symbols RPG
4:22 - Colin's last 2 Games sold soft
5:51 - Making Trophy Lists for PlayStation Games
7:53 - Uncharted, The Last of Us Part 3 & Last of Us HBO

37:06 - Colin doesn't think he's a Good Leader
38:31 - Last Stand Media‚Äôs Future and Live Streaming 
41:17 - PS5 Slop Games and AI Garbage
41:51 - Dan and Colin Platinumed Death Stranding 1 and 2 back to back
45:10 - Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
47:03 - Mafia 3
49:00 - Mindseye
49:58 - GTA 6

1:11:28 - PS6
1:14:28 - Trophies on PC and PSN Profiles
1:17:06 - Colin breaks Dan
1:18:32 - Colin‚Äôs Collectibles, GI Joe and Megaman
1:20:32 - Resident Evil and final thanks to Colin
